abstract: Facebook said it bought Friendfeed, picking up a group of former Google engineers in the process.
snippet: Facebook said it bought Friendfeed, picking up a group of former Google engineers in the process.
lead_paragraph: Facebook said it would buy FriendFeed, netting a group of prized ex-Google engineers, Reuters writes.

headline.main: Adding FriendFeed, Facebook Gets Ex-Googlers Too
